attributes.action: abolish the "new" fines system and bring back REAL justice!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am not alone in saying that the government has gone money mad! what happend to real justice? tony blair should abolish the new system of giving people "on the spot" fines and bring back real punishment and a decent justice system! we need your vote to get the law changed!!! its your life and your future. do not let the government destroy it. stop the fines now and bring back real justice for criminals
